column1: #Text=Sokka says : " How did you guys get out ? "
#Text=Aang says : " Just like the legend said , we let love lead the way . "
#Text=" Chong says : " Nobody react to what I 'm about to tell you : I think that kid might be the Avatar !
#Text=" Aang says : " So are you guys going to come to Omashu with us ?
#Text=" Chong says : " Sokka , I hope you learned a little something about not letting the plans get in the way of the journey .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Just play your songs .
#Text=Even if you 're lost , you ca n't lose the love because it 's in your heart .
